help-file.title: DISHARMONIST
help-file.content:
The disharmonist has developed the harmonic ability to resonate their voice and add to the power of their songs. This training of their very voice has increased their vocal ranges to enable top range notes to bring damage to their foes.
Skills --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 36th level: Shriek
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 9th circle: Shatter
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 31st level: Echo
